LanguageData.MSE_BasicProsthetics.label: basic prosthetics
LanguageData.MSE_OrganTransplantation.label: organ transplantation
LanguageData.MSE_OrganTransplantation.description: Allows removed organ from one body to be placed in the body of a recipient, to replace a damaged or missing organ.
LanguageData.MSE_BoneReplacement.label: bone replacement
LanguageData.MSE_BoneReplacement.description: Craft inexpensive prosthetic bone and replace broken bone with it. Requires a skilled crafter to make.
LanguageData.MSE_ProstheticOrgans.label: prosthetic organs
LanguageData.MSE_ProstheticOrgans.description: Craft inexpensive prosthetic organ and replace unhealthy or missing organ with it. Requires a skilled crafter to make.
LanguageData.MSE_BionicBones.label: bionic bones
LanguageData.MSE_BionicBones.description: Build high-tech bionic bones at a bionic machining table. Requires a skilled doctor to attach.
LanguageData.MSE_BionicOrgans.label: bionic organs
LanguageData.MSE_BionicOrgans.description: Build high-tech bionic organs at a bionic machining table. Requires a skilled doctor to attach.
LanguageData.MSE_SpecialBionics.label: special bionics
LanguageData.MSE_SpecialBionics.description: Build ultra high-tech bionic body parts, bones, and organs at a bionic machining table. Requires a skilled doctor to attach.
LanguageData.MSE_ModulesSurgery.label: modules surgery
LanguageData.MSE_ModulesSurgery.description: Allows you to perform surgery to attach modules to bionic or archotech body part. Requires a very skilled doctor to attach.
LanguageData.MSE_Implants.label: implants
LanguageData.MSE_Implants.description: Build high-tech bionic implants at a bionic machining table. Requires a very skilled doctor to install.
LanguageData.MSE_BrainImplants.label: brain implants
LanguageData.MSE_BrainImplants.description: Build high-tech bionic brain implants at a bionic machining table. Requires a very skilled doctor to install.
LanguageData.MSE_ArchotechSurgery.label: archotech surgery
LanguageData.MSE_ArchotechSurgery.description: Allows you to perform surgery to attach archotech body parts. Requires a very skilled doctor to attach.
LanguageData.MSE_ModulesCrafting.label: modules crafting
LanguageData.MSE_ModulesCrafting.description: Allows you to craft modules. Requires a skilled crafter to make.
LanguageData.MSE_ArchotechImplantsSurgery.label: archotech implants surgery
LanguageData.MSE_ArchotechImplantsSurgery.description: Allows you to perform surgery to install archotech implants on body parts. Requires a very skilled doctor to install.
LanguageData.MSE_ArchotechCrafting.label: archotech crafting
LanguageData.MSE_ArchotechCrafting.description: Allows you to uncover the secret of an archotech technology so you can able to craft archotech body parts. Requires a very skilled crafter to make.
LanguageData.MSE_ArchotechModules.label: archotech modules
LanguageData.MSE_ArchotechModules.description: Build high-tech archotech modules at a archotech fabrication bench. Requires a very skilled doctor to attach.
LanguageData.MSE_ArchotechImplantsCrafting.label: archotech implants crafting
LanguageData.MSE_ArchotechImplantsCrafting.descriptio: Allows you to craft archotech implant. Requires a very skilled crafter to make.
